error[E0382]: borrow of moved value: `data`
 --> src/main.rs:18:20
  |
15 |     let data = vec![1, 2, 3];
   |         ---- move occurs because `data` has type `Vec<i32>`, which does not implement the `Copy` trait
16 |     process(data);
   |             ---- value moved here
17 |     
18 |     println!("{:?}", data);
   |                      ^^^^ value borrowed here after move
  |

code.explanation: A variable was used after its contents have been moved elsewhere.
